html:
6.18.20  3:03 am   I can't find happiness anywhere but skateboarding. Life is a drag, any clue how to change this? 

      have you considered dedicating your life to skateboarding

6.18.20  2:59 am   Thoughts on coconuts migrating?

      thanks to the industrial revolution,

6.18.20  2:59 am   How to make sandwich?

      start putting bread on either side of things until you feel a special tingling sensation

6.18.20  2:05 am   Do you think the same thought process goes behind making music and making video games?

      ultimately those things at their core are not governed by a thought process. it is the process of time itself

6.18.20  1:30 am   Do you have any tips on picking a brand of soap?

      yes, try to get one of the ones that isn't haunted

6.18.20  1:14 am   What kind of music do you listen to?

      regular

6.18.20  12:44 am   Would you ever answer a repeat question?

      that's preposterous. who do you think i am

6.18.20  12:32 am   any tips on being better at music theory?

      you are supposed to make the theory, and then get your mind blown repeatedly when the music slyly twists and bends to both evade and re-affirm your theory(s)

6.17.20  11:41 pm   What is your input on the 'birds aren't real' theory

      its full name is the 'birds aren't real theory isn't real theory', in which you are supposed to guess whether the birds aren't real theory is real or not

6.17.20  11:37 pm   what will you do after making 1000 videos

      that depends which videos they are

6.17.20  11:33 pm   How do you come up with your ideas?

      everything is ideas. i used to have a net to catch them, but then i realized i don't need the net, if anything i may need something more like an umbrella

6.17.20  11:33 pm   I have a somewhat ridiculous idea... it might lead nowhere, but it might change the world. how should I proceed?

      have a business lunch, discuss it a bit, then go forward with it

6.17.20  11:19 pm   Do you do the things?

      it's on my to-do list

6.17.20  11:17 pm   Is music a good way to attract women, if they enjoy music?

      music is a good way to attract anyone, but it works best when combined delicately with little bits of non-music

6.17.20  11:10 pm   why do people keep asking how you stay awake all the time?

     usually it's because they've assumed that the time on the questions is the time the question is answered (not asked) which would leave almost no time to sleep, but more importantly, no time to make any of the audio/visual content which is so important to me

      how do they know when you're awake?

     they don't

6.17.20  11:02 pm   Why is jazz pop so beautiful?

     never heard of it

     Is it because of trees?

      i will admit, trees is a common excuse for beauty

6.17.20  10:54 pm   What activities/things do you do when you are thinking of lyrics?

      songwriting

6.17.20  10:51 pm   Hey bill how how is your voice forming such a perfect melody?

      could be a result of joining the dark side

6.17.20  10:49 pm   how to harmonize 

      pretend you weren't going to. then go through the song and let the song beg for harmonization in certain places

6.17.20  10:42 pm   are you bill soap tips kinda like linus tech tips

      no

6.17.20  10:42 pm   whats a video?

      i'm figuring that out right now

6.17.20  10:39 pm   are you become music?

      yep, that's me

6.17.20  10:10 pm    do you think comic sans could become a mainstream font that everyone uses for papers or essays

      i thought it already was

6.17.20  10:01 pm   do you think math is beautiful 

      i was going to say no but now that i think about it yes

6.17.20  9:24 pm   Are you making new songs soon?

      YES

6.17.20  9:21 pm   should i make a schedule or go with the flow?

      you could try going with the flow, unless there is no flow, in which case make a schedule

6.17.20  9:12 pm   did you ever make it to the south pole

      i must have made it there at some point, because the video got made and it does include the south pole

6.17.20  8:30 pm   I left a question here a long time ago and I don't remember what it was or when exactly I left it. How can I try to find it again to see if you answered it?

      was it this one

6.17.20  8:17 pm   what would you do if you could fly?

      get some interesting video footage

6.17.20  8:13 pm   what to do when I want to live an adventure but am too insecure to face new challenges?

      could try doing 2 adventures at the same time, which will create a diversion and you will forget which one to be insecure about

6.17.20  6:47 pm   Will you come back to making videos and songs?

      way more than before

6.17.20  6:21 pm   if you made a video game, what genre would it be?

      *plausible*

6.17.20  5:46 pm   I get confused when people use a percentage higher than 100%, like 200% or even 600%. Isn't 100% supposed the to be the highest?

      if the number is higher, it means they are talking about something more than the original thing. so like if you have 1 pie, and they said surprise, there's now 300% of that, that means there's 3 pies now. 100% was the whole first pie. anything higher than that, means more pies have now been introduced

6.17.20  5:06 pm   What is Obama's last name?

      might be jeff

6.17.20  4:53 pm   Are you project?

      yep, that's me

6.17.20  3:58 pm   in your opinion, is every dog a good boy?

      some of them may be girls, etc

6.17.20  3:23 pm   what is your deepest and darkest secret?

      how absolutely and hopelessly round the world is

6.17.20  2:48 pm   what typeface do you use?

      i'm working on developing a way to switch typefaces

6.17.20  1:39 pm   how often do you come up with video ideas?

      every moment if i'm not careful

6.17.20  1:28 pm   How are you so charismatic through your music and sketches?

      i found some books on charisma, which i have put through the paper shredder and i've sprinkled little bits of the pages throughout every piece of work i do

6.17.20  1:20 pm   what inspired you to make this type of work?

      just trying to get by

6.17.20  1:04 pm   what is it like making your videos

      should be a breeze but we'll see

6.17.20  1:03 pm   what do i make for dinner

      how about a bonus round of lunches

6.17.20  1:02 pm   When should I use the mountain escape plan?

      maybe at the beginning

6.17.20  12:50 pm   I have a theory. It goes like this: "If you really like good music, you are capable of one day creating good music." This theory relies on the fact that becoming capable of creating the good music is just a matter of learning the necessary skills to make it, and that once you have those skills, it is all up to your taste/opinion to create the good music. You could then extend this theory to say that "everyone likes good music (at least what they think is good), and so everyone has the potential to make more of this good music." Thoughts?

      .....let me perform some calculations...

6.17.20  12:45 pm   are you making sure you are doing good mental health wise

     are you kidding, mental health is my middle name

      and staying hydrated

      i should have mentioned i have 2 middle names, that's the other one

6.17.20  12:29 pm   from what world are you from?

      regular world

6.17.20  12:29 pm   are u gonna be in any movies on the big screen?

      if so, it would also probably be me who is making the movie

6.17.20  12:13 pm   Where does your creativity come from

      the sewer, if not the gutter

6.17.20  11:13 am   What songs are considered "abnormal"?

      all of them. songs being abnormal is normal. there are, however, some exceptions to this, in which case those songs are considered abnormal due to being abnormal
